post.title: pioneer kuro 5010fd vs samsung ln52a650 (lcd) within 100 dollars of eachother.
post.content: i heard the kuro's are pretty much impervious to burn in, but does this older model do 24p / ect. or am i better off with the new samsung 52" a650. i do a lot of gaming, and have had burn in issues, my local bb has the kuro heavily discounted nib. so idk, i need to make a descision soon.
